name: Heroes of Might and Magic 4
description:
Heroes of Might and Magic 4 is a strategy game developed by New World Computing. It came out on 25-03-2002. It was published by The 3DO Company. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Heroes of Might and Magic 4 is available on PC.
James W. Dickinson produced the game. David Mullich directed the game. It was scored by Paul James, Paul Romero, Rob King and Steve Baca.
